Summary: First of all, we had no communication from the management when I requested 2 adjoining or nearby rooms. I emailed a couple of different times to check on that request, heard nothing. Dirty, grimy baseboards and walls. Doors were covered in dirty handprints. Even though it was December, there were BUGS in our room. I can only imagine what it would be like in the summer.... ick. The bathtubs were barely held together with cracking caulk. The TP was one-ply. The wi-fi passwords "expire" in 2 days, and would only allow 2 devices per password. The old TVs had poor reception. We were never left with enough towels, even though the rooms CLEARLY were meant for 4 people (2 double beds). Overall, it was a dump and we will never return. Ever.

This place was horrible. We were scared to death. The carpet felt wet and smelled. There was blood on the wall and when we pulled the blankets back on the bed it looked like a murder scene. There was blood all over the side of the bed. We immediately asked for our money back. The front desk was nice enough to give us back our money since we booked this through a non refund app. I would not let anyone stay here ever. Not a good area of town either. Scared.

Nastiest place I've been too bugs in every corner of room and I found one on the bed where my two kids slept!!!! DONT COME HERE it should be closed down!!! Mold in bathroom couch with nasty stains.... its just ridiculous these owners need to put this place down or someone needs to shut it down I can't even explain how disgusted I am

We were there for one night, got the room cause it was fairly close to the beach, service was good friendly front desk guy I would recommend it, for the price it's good, (clean sheets and covers) the only thing it was the tub drain was not draining fast, but at least was draining.  I would stay there again.

Sono un ragazzo italiano di 21 anni ed ho passato nell'esate del 2012 durante il periodo dell'U.S.A. open of surf con 3 amici ben 8 notti in questo motel. Lo abbiamo scelto per il prezzo che era molto conveniente. Da huntington beach dista tra i 20 e i 40 minuti in macchina in base al traffico che si trova. Non è proprio vicino ma per i prezzi che ti propongo in quella zona ad orange county facendoti un calcolo tra la benzina che si spende ad andare tutti i giorni ad huntignton più le spese dell'hotel risparmi comunque parecchio. Il proprietario del motel è un indiano molto disponibile e simpatico. A noi ha fatto allogiare in una camera da 2 persone anche se eravamo in 4. Le camere sono molto pulite e con letti comodi. Quindi per chi non cerca una sistemazione di lusso nei
